title: Can riot solve this problem？？？？？
body: I can not play league of legends, each time i open the new client it said  "There was a problem patching league of legends" However，Is already the latest client

replies.body: There could be some smaller updates trying to catch up, or the update in whole didn't install properly.  This can happen with an unstable connection trying to reach the patching service, so my suggestion would be to first run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to run a repair afterwards if necessary.  Let me know if you have any questions!
